021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.CmdSource;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.LogProvider;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
025import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ProxyProvider;
026import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.ServerConnector;
027import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.helper.CraftingRecipe;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.scheduler.SchedulerProvider;
029import net.tnemc.plugincore.sponge.SpongePluginCore;
030import net.tnemc.plugincore.sponge.impl.scheduler.SpongeScheduler;
031import net.tnemc.sponge.SpongeItemCalculationsProvider;
032import net.tnemc.sponge.SpongeItemStack;
033import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
034import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
035import org.spongepowered.api.Sponge;
036import org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.server.ServerPlayer;
037import org.spongepowered.api.util.Nameable;
038import org.spongepowered.api.world.DefaultWorldKeys;
039import revxrsal.commands.command.CommandActor;
040import revxrsal.commands.sponge.actor.SpongeCommandActor;
041
042import java.io.File;
043import java.io.FileOutputStream;
044import java.io.IOException;
045import java.io.InputStream;
046import java.io.OutputStream;
047import java.net.URL;
048import java.net.URLConnection;
049import java.util.Optional;
050import java.util.Set;
051import java.util.UUID;
052import java.util.stream.Collectors;
053
054/**
055 * SpongeServerProvider
056 *
057 * @author creatorfromhell
058 * @since 0.1.2.0
059 */
060public class SpongeServerProvider implements ServerConnector {
061
062  private final SpongeItemCalculationsProvider calc = new SpongeItemCalculationsProvider();
063  private final SpongeProxyProvider proxy = new SpongeProxyProvider();
064
065  private final SpongeScheduler scheduler;
066
067  protected String world = null;
068
069  public SpongeServerProvider() {
070
071    this.scheduler = new SpongeScheduler();
072  }
073
074  @Override
075  public String name() {
076
077    return "sponge";
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Used to replace placeholders from a string.
082   *
083   * @param player  The player to use for the placeholder replacement.
084   * @param message The message to replace placeholders in.
085   *
086   * @return The string after placeholders have been replaced.
087   */
088  @Override
089  public String replacePlaceholder(final UUID player, final String message) {
090
091    return message;
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * The proxy provider to use for this implementation.
096   *
097   * @return The proxy provider to use for this implementation.
098   */
099  @Override
100  public ProxyProvider proxy() {
101
102    return proxy;
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Used to convert an {@link CommandActor} to a {@link CmdSource}.
107   *
108   * @param actor The command actor.
109   *
110   * @return The {@link CmdSource} for this actor.
111   */
112  @Override
113  public CmdSource<?> source(@NotNull final CommandActor actor) {
114
115    return new SpongeCMDSource((SpongeCommandActor)actor);
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Retrieves a set of online player names.
120   *
121   * @return Set of online player names.
122   */
123  @Override
124  public Set<String> onlinePlayersList() {
125
126    return Sponge.server().onlinePlayers().stream()
127            .map(Nameable::name)
128            .collect(Collectors.toSet());
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Used to get the amount of online players.
133   *
134   * @return The amount of online players.
135   */
136  @Override
137  public int onlinePlayers() {
138
139    return Sponge.server().onlinePlayers().size();
140  }
141
142  /**
143   * Attempts to find a {@link PlayerProvider player} based on an {@link UUID identifier}.
144   *
145   * @param identifier The identifier
146   *
147   * @return An Optional containing the located {@link PlayerProvider player}, or an empty Optional
148   * if no player is located.
149   */
150  @Override
151  public Optional<PlayerProvider> findPlayer(@NotNull final UUID identifier) {
152
153    final Optional<ServerPlayer> player = Sponge.server().player(identifier);
154    return player.map(value->new SpongePlayerProvider(value.user(), SpongePluginCore.instance().getContainer()));
155  }
156
157  /**
158   * This is used to return an instance of an {@link PlayerProvider player} based on the provided
159   * instance's player object.
160   *
161   * @param player The instance of the player.
162   *
163   * @return The initialized {@link PlayerProvider player object}.
164   */
165  @Override
166  public PlayerProvider initializePlayer(@NotNull final Object player) {
167
168    if(player instanceof final ServerPlayer playerObj) {
169      return new SpongePlayerProvider(playerObj.user(), SpongePluginCore.instance().getContainer());
170    }
171    return null;
172  }
173
174  /**
175   * Used to determine if this player has played on this server before.
176   *
177   * @param identifier The {@link UUID} that is associated with the player.
178   *
179   * @return True if the player has played on the server before, otherwise false.
180   */
181  @Override
182  public boolean playedBefore(final UUID identifier) {
183
184    final Optional<ServerPlayer> player = Sponge.server().player(identifier);
185    return player.map(ServerPlayer::hasPlayedBefore).orElse(false);
186  }
187
188  /**
189   * Used to determine if a player with the specified username has played before.
190   *
191   * @param name The username to search for.
192   *
193   * @return True if someone with the specified username has played before, otherwise false.
194   */
195  @Override
196  public boolean playedBefore(final String name) {
197
198    final Optional<ServerPlayer> player = Sponge.server().player(name);
199    return player.map(ServerPlayer::hasPlayedBefore).orElse(false);
200  }
201
202  /**
203   * Used to determine if a player with the specified username is online.
204   *
205   * @param name The username to search for.
206   *
207   * @return True if someone with the specified username is online.
208   */
209  @Override
210  public boolean online(final String name) {
211
212    try {
213
214      final Optional<ServerPlayer> player = Sponge.server().player(UUID.fromString(name));
215      return player.map(ServerPlayer::isOnline).orElse(false);
216    } catch(final Exception e) {
217
218      final Optional<ServerPlayer> player = Sponge.server().player(name);
219      return player.map(ServerPlayer::isOnline).orElse(false);
220    }
221  }
222
223  @Override
224  public Optional<UUID> fromName(final String name) {
225
226    return Optional.empty();
227  }
228
229  /**
230   * Used to locate a username for a specific name. This could be called from either a primary or
231   * secondary thread, and should not call back to the Mojang API ever.
232   *
233   * @param id The {@link UUID} to use for the search.
234   *
235   * @return An optional containing the name if exists, otherwise false.
236   */
237  @Override
238  public Optional<String> fromID(final UUID id) {
239
240    return Optional.empty();
241  }
242
243  /**
244   * Returns the name of the default world.
245   *
246   * @return The name of the default world.
247   */
248  @Override
249  public String defaultWorld() {
250
251    if(world == null) {
252      world = Sponge.server().worldManager().world(DefaultWorldKeys.DEFAULT).get().key().asString();
253    }
254    return world;
255  }
256
257  /**
258   * Used to replace colour codes in a string.
259   *
260   * @param string The string to format.
261   * @param strip  If true, the color codes are striped from the string.
262   *
263   * @return The formatted string.
264   */
265  @Override
266  public String replaceColours(final String string, final boolean strip) {
267
268    return string;
269  }
270
271  @Override
272  public AbstractItemStack<?> stackBuilder() {
273
274    return new SpongeItemStack();
275  }
276
277  @Override
278  public void saveResource(String resourcePath, final boolean replace) {
279
280    if(resourcePath != null && !resourcePath.isEmpty()) {
281
282      resourcePath = resourcePath.replace('\\', '/');
283
284      final LogProvider logger = SpongePluginCore.log();
285      final InputStream in = this.getResource(resourcePath);
286      if(in == null) {
287
288        throw new IllegalArgumentException("The embedded resource '" + resourcePath + "' cannot be found in the jar.");
289      } else {
290
291        final File outFile = new File(SpongePluginCore.directory(), resourcePath);
292        final int lastIndex = resourcePath.lastIndexOf(47);
293        final File outDir = new File(SpongePluginCore.directory(), resourcePath.substring(0, Math.max(lastIndex, 0)));
294        if(!outDir.exists()) {
295          outDir.mkdirs();
296        }
297
298        try {
299          if(outFile.exists() && !replace) {
300          } else {
301
302            final OutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(outFile);
303            final byte[] buf = new byte[1024];
304
305            int len;
306            while((len = in.read(buf)) > 0) {
307              out.write(buf, 0, len);
308            }
309
310            out.close();
311            in.close();
312          }
313        } catch(final IOException ignore) {
314          logger.error("Could not save " + outFile.getName() + " to " + outFile);
315        }
316
317      }
318    } else {
319      throw new IllegalArgumentException("ResourcePath cannot be null or empty");
320    }
321  }
322
323  /**
324   * Provides this implementation's {@link SchedulerProvider scheduler}.
325   *
326   * @return The scheduler for this implementation.
327   */
328  @Override
329  public SpongeScheduler scheduler() {
330
331    return scheduler;
332  }
333
334  /**
335   * Used to register a crafting recipe to the server.
336   *
337   * @param key    The key for the crafting recipe to be registered.
338   * @param recipe The crafting recipe to register.
339   *
340   * @see CraftingRecipe
341   */
342  @Override
343  public void registerCrafting(@NotNull final String key, @NotNull final CraftingRecipe recipe) {
344    //TODO: Sponge Register crafting
345  }
346
347  @Override
348  public SpongeItemCalculationsProvider calculations() {
349
350    return calc;
351  }
352
353  @Override
354  public @Nullable InputStream getResource(@NotNull final String filename) {
355
356    try {
357      final URL url = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource(filename);
358      if(url == null) {
359        return null;
360      } else {
361        final URLConnection connection = url.openConnection();
362        connection.setUseCaches(false);
363        return connection.getInputStream();
364      }
365    } catch(final IOException var4) {
366      return null;
367    }
368  }
369}
